# Come face threats in a burdened world. Souls-like meets Fable in this magic filled RPG inspired by Full Metal Alchemist Brotherhood.
<!--text-->
Join our Discord [](https://discord.gg/ExzZCSxfe7) Or ELSE!....Or else you'll miss out on updates, competitions and having a big impact on this project...

FADE: The Sacrifice is an Dark Fantasy Action RPG that combines combat inspired by the “Souls Series” with the narrative direction of FABLE and the anime Full Metal Alchemist.

Heroes will be tasked with exploring the settlements of Celeste, Solemn, Whisper, and The Baltane Capital in order stop the 5 Homunculus Monarchs, each with their own unique spin on alchemy and combat, sharing a destructive plot to sacrifice the country.

To succeed in your journey, you’ll have to meet new companions, take on side quests, craft useful items and collect powerful equipment and legendary weapons.


Weapon Augment System and Rare Armors - On your journey, you'll find rare equipment left behind by fallen Baltane Residents or peddled by opportunists. Even more rare are weapon augments, special items that can be used to improve your combat prowess with weapon skills.


Daedalus Doors - Invented by William Daedalus due to his fear of open spaces, Daedalus doors create pocket dimensions sealed away from everyday people. Though sentient, age and manipulation can cause them to become careless, opening and allowing the player to claim the treasures that lie within.


Rare treasures and trinkets - Scattered across Baltane are enchanted rings and accessories that can mold your playstyle for a unique approach. You'll have to take on side quests, travel to secret locations, and navigate through difficult situations to get your hands on them. Due to most not being talented enough to cast magic from aura at will, most use enchanted weapons to bypass this. Find powerful enchanted and legendary weapons and use them to dominate your foes.

Engaging side quest and character - Meet interesting NPCs and make an impact in their lives.
Aura Flask System - Find special items to augment your Aura Flask to heal in ways that match your combat style.
5 Unique companions to unlock.

Currently FADE: The Sacrifice is Live on Kickstarter, seeking funding to finish the game! Make sure to check us out and support us if you enjoy the demo!
